metadata.title: CVE-2022-4743 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: A potential memory leak issue was discovered in SDL2 in GLES_CreateTexture() function in SDL_render_gles.c. The vulnerability allows an attacker to cause a denial of service attack. The vulnerability affects SDL2 v2.0.4 and above. SDL-1.x are not affected.

notes.note: mdeslaur> Unlikely to be exploitable by an attacker, so just a regular bug with no security impact. Setting priority to low.

criterions.comment: libsdl2 package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
